args.new_str:
34    # Following you need to finish the context aware decoding method introduced in the paper
    35    # This is the only function that you should edit in this file
    36    device = input_ids.device
    37    alpha = 0.5  # default as in the paper, ignore input alpha
    38    generated = input_ids.clone()
    39    max_gen_len = 128
    40    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    41    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    42    for _ in range(max_gen_len):
    43        # Forward with context (context+question)
    44        outputs_with_context = model(generated)
    45        logits_with_context = outputs_with_context.logits[:, -1, :]
    46        # Forward without context (question only)
    47        question_only = generated[:, context_len:]
    48        outputs_without_context = model(question_only)
    49        logits_without_context = outputs_without_context.logits[:, -1, :]
    50        # Adjusted logits
    51        adjusted_logits = (1+alpha)*logits_with_context - alpha*logits_without_context
    52        next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
    53        generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
    54        if (next_token == eos_token_id).all():
    55            break
    56    return generated
